ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: but rather denied the truth and turned away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But only disavowed and turned away;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: on the contrary, he gave the lie to the Truth and turned his back upon it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He rejects the faith, turns away
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: But he denied and turned away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But on the contrary, he denied and turned away!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But called the truth a lie and turned back,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: but he cried it lies, and he turned away,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but rejected the Truth and turned away!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: But he belied and turned away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But on the contrary, he rejected Truth and turned away!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But on the contrary, he belied (this Quran and the Message of Muhammad SAW) and turned away!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: he belied the truth and turned away;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But he denied and turned away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But [instead], he denied and turned away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [75:32] but he denied, the Qur’ān, and he turned away, from faith,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But he denied) Allah's divine Oneness (and flouted) and turned away from faith.
